com.github.rholder.fauxflake.api

Interface EncodingProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlakeEncodingProvider, SnowflakeEncodingProvider

    public interface EncodingProvider
    Implementations of this interface are responsible for converting time and sequence values into valid encoded identifiers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encodeAsBytes(long time, int sequence)
      Return a raw byte encoding of the given time and sequence number.
      long encodeAsLong(long time, int sequence)
      Return a Long encoding of the given the time and sequence number.
      java.lang.String encodeAsString(long time, int sequence)
      Return a String encoding of the given the time and sequence number.
      int maxSequenceNumbers()
      Return the maximum number of sequence numbers that can be encoded for a given time by this implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • encodeAsBytes

        byte[] encodeAsBytes(long time,
                   int sequence)
        Return a raw byte encoding of the given time and sequence number.
        Parameters:
        time - a time value to encode
        sequence - a sequence value to encode

      • encodeAsLong

        long encodeAsLong(long time,
                int sequence)
        Return a Long encoding of the given the time and sequence number.
        Parameters:
        time - a time value to encode
        sequence - a sequence value to encode

      • encodeAsString

        java.lang.String encodeAsString(long time,
                              int sequence)
        Return a String encoding of the given the time and sequence number.
        Parameters:
        time - a time value to encode
        sequence - a sequence value to encode

      • maxSequenceNumbers

        int maxSequenceNumbers()
        Return the maximum number of sequence numbers that can be encoded for a given time by this implementation.
